title: Can we add larger point values to blood moon?
body: Like give us a choice for maybe like 350, 500, 1000 points. Like I want to play longer without starting a new game every ten minutes, idk how others feel about that, but I would like higher points as an additional option,

replies.body: idk, i personally feel like the game is perfectly paced, 10 to 13 minutes per game is perfect for players who want to try out all the champs without having to dedicate an extra 7 or 8 minutes to each one.  that and the que times are pretty low due to its popularity.
